Installation

Installation

How to install dependencies and structure your app.

The installation process is very simple. If you are already using shadcn/ui, you can skip this step and go straight to installing components.

If not using shadcn/ui yet, you can follow the steps below:

  1. First, follow the installation instructions for shadcn/ui in your project.

  2. Make sure you're using the modern shadcn CLI (not the legacy shadcn-ui).

  3. Install components using the CLI.
